local_intent: Execute a straight negative-X pull of 0.2 to open the drawer while grasping the handle, then verify the drawer is open.
assumptions: Handle already grasped and aligned before pull
Pull axis aligns with robot's negative X direction
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT phase: MoveDelta(axis=x, dist=-0.2, timeout_ms=1500) followed by ContainerOpen check.
